data: TM AMB Red Blood Cell (RBC) and Platelet Transfusion Once (Day of Treatment)
Patient Care
Insert Peripheral IV Catheter
Blood Products
Group and screen required. (Sample expires every 3 days at 2359h on the third day following date of collection)
Special requirements (e.g. irradiated) must be identified for red blood cell and platelet transfusion orders. For instructions for special requirements consult linked resource

Consider patient history:  1. Known blood antibodies (antibody card)  2. Blood disorder or a blood cancer such as leukemia, lymphoma, or myeloma  3. Transplant procedure  4. Immune deficiency disorder  5. Pregnancy within 90 days
